description: Smallest number w such that A051953(w) = w - EulerPhi(w) is n-th prime.
formula: A050530(a(n)) = p(n) = n-th prime and a(n) is least number with this property.a(n) = A063507(A000040(n)). - _Michel Marcus_, Feb 02 2015
example: The 31st term is 255 since 255 - Phi(255) = 127, the 31st prime.
prog: (PARI) a(n) = {my(k = 1); while(k - eulerphi(k) != prime(n), k++); k;} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 02 2015
author: _Labos Elemer_, Jan 05 2000
